TopicTitle: Deep Space Network - pre release - old game continue

Articles.Content: Hi, I have a very big question to the developers will be there an option to turn on DSN on my current save, after restarting the game at 0.9 managing ship exchange with 1.1 (heat influence) I see that features are available in game since update but not this one. Please give us an option, sending new satellites to all planets is a new chapter in saving my space program and I would like that in my carrier mode save
You can dig in the save files themselves and there should be an option to toggle the DSN for your saves, don't know where exactly though.
You don't have to dig in your save files.  It's an option in the settings.
Thank you, this is easy, I missed the settings in my search for solution.
